  • Method Details

    • fillRandomBoxes

      public void fillRandomBoxes()
      This method initially fills the Sudoku with 2 numbers per box.

    • validateNumber

      public boolean validateNumber(int row, int col, int n)
      This method validates that the entered number is valid.
      Parameters:
      row - Row where the number will be entered.
      col - Column where the number will be entered.
      n - Number that will be entered.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the number exists or not.

    • checkThereNumberValid

      public boolean checkThereNumberValid()
      This method checks if a number can be entered in any cell.
      Returns:
      A boolean checking if any cell can take a number.

    • findValidNumber

      public int findValidNumber(int row, int col)
      This number searches for valid numbers in the position where it is entered.
      Parameters:
      row - Row where the number will be filled in.
      col - Column where the number will be filled in.
      Returns:
      A valid number in that position; if none are valid, it returns -1.

    • win

      public boolean win()
      This method checks that all the cells have a value; since they were valid, it means that you won.
      Returns:
      Boolean checking if you won.
